summary: The document is a historical record detailing a legal name change from Adrian Sotomayor to Manuel Marti, as ordered by a court in Puerto Rico on February 12, 1963. It also covers the correction of the paternal surname on the birth certificates of Manuel Marti's two children from Sotomayor to Marti. This record was part of an investigation conducted by the 771st MI Detachment at Fort Brooke, Puerto Rico. Initially classified, the document has since been released to the public, albeit with certain redactions.
key_findings: The document details a legal name change from Adrian Sotomayor to Manuel Marti.
It includes corrections to the birth certificates of Manuel Marti's children to reflect the correct paternal surname.
The document is associated with a military investigation unit in Puerto Rico.
Originally classified, the document has been released with some information redacted.
